name: Diegeon
description:
VERY IMPORTANT NOTE - There may be a glitch with the resolution in the downloadable version that makes the game extremely pixelated. If this is the case, use ALT + ENTER to minimize and then maximize the window.

Welcome to the Diegeon. A place full of monsters, weapons and...cursed D6's?

You play as an unlucky dungeon crawler that defends himself from the monsters there using a magic dice (that are cursed and roll themselves every 5 seconds, really gets annoying during game night) The dungeon crawler has found himself trapped in a sort of arena room and needs to use the dice to defend himself. But he needs to remind himself..."The dice can giveth and the dice can taketh away"

ControlsWASD/Arrow keysMoveSpacebarRoll diceLeft mouse buttonPunch/swing swordRight mouse buttonShoot gunPPause game

Created for the GMTK game jam 2022.

P.S - My high score is 9900 so maybe you should try to beat that.
